title: "Client has encountered a critical error", ticket page inaccessible
body: Client stops working right during champion in ranked, a message shows up saying the client has encountered a critical error. I restart the client but is still docked LPs and get a dodge timer. I try to submit a ticket (the support website is VERY buggy) and when I try to log it tells me "logged out successfully". Help.

replies.body: A critical error may be due to an installation or corrupt data issue with your game files.  DTN has provided has great information here, and the[ Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide should help get this fixed up.  Let us know if you have any issues or error messages afterward!

I'd suggest clearing your browser cache as a potential fix for the Support login issue.

As for your LP loss, unfortunately Riot does not grant that sort of request; while your issue may have been unavoidable, there are people that take no precautions to prevent recurring errors or they intentionally cause them and will not hesitate to abuse Riot's leniency.

If you continue to have issues with your client please create a new thread describing the issue so we can assist if a simple client repair does not fix it, and you may find additional resources on the [Bug Splat & Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) support article.
